Header: Troops Use Own Money to Buy School Accessories to Poor Students
Content: 64 Division troops of the Security Forces Mullaittivu with the idea of helping under privileged students in their area organized a distribution of school accessories on Tuesday (9) at Oddusudan, Sinna Salamban Eshwaran College. The project, an initiative of the troops themselves gave away those accessories to 30 selected students including school bags. Major General W.D.C.K Costa, General Officer Commanding of the 64 Division graced the event as the Chief Guest. Teachers, students, parents and Other Ranks joined the occasion.
